message.content:
cs.DC, cs.CR, cs.SY, cs.NI, cs.DS 

The paper discusses the issues of data confidentiality, integrity, and availability in distributed simulations, which are related to distributed computing (cs.DC) and security and privacy (cs.CR). The paper also mentions the rise of distributed and cloud-based simulation, which falls under the category of systems and control (cs.SY). The solution proposed in the paper involves anonymization, which is related to networking and internet architecture (cs.NI). Finally, the paper evaluates the performance of the proposed solution, which falls under the category of distributed, parallel, and cluster computing (cs.DS).
